H0.text: where is geothermal energy used the most in the us. Nevada

H1.text: where is geothermal energy used the most in the us. Hawaii

H2.text: where is geothermal energy used the most in the us. Oregon

H3.text: where is geothermal energy used the most in the us. California

A4.text: Geothermal power stations in the United States are located exclusively within the Western United States where geothermal energy potential is highest.

A5.text: The Geysers, located in California, is the largest geothermal field in the world with a nameplate capacity of 1,517 MW and an annual generation of 6,516 GWh in 2018.
